summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help improve the federal government. We alert department heads to our recommendations that can save the most money, address issues on our High Risk List , or significantly improve government operations. This report outlines our 30 priority open recommendations for the Department of Veterans Affairs as of March 2019. For example, we recommended in 2018 that...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Department of Veterans Affairs
